Text:
Thanks goes to Systom for uploading the book in image format.

However, I found it to be extremely difficult and annoying to read it like that, so I went ahead and converted it into a PDF to preserve my own sanity.
Are you going share this or not?
Very nicely done, really cuts down the size which is great, thanks for the shouts.

Uh.. Seed please. It's going nowhere near 1% in this condition. Again, seed please =]

Great torrent btw, a pdf format of this series.
